body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
The police comming for him was nice, but the machine thing was a very lame ending for a great work.
This came out in 2001 or something... This art
*oh wait the girl name is Yuki, Remi is the teacher's name
Glad the justice is after that fucker.

Here's the summary if you havent read the book: MC is a natural sadist born in a dysfunctional household ( his mama is a hoe and his father has mistresses). Remi is our innocent but over achievement girl, and she made a bet w MC "to show him what's love". But she gave up after he *almost* boardcast her defloration to the whole school, he use that to blackmail her into have sex w him. However, the teacher(the director in this last chap), another sub of him which he fucked (he reminds her of her old dom), got jealous and mind break Remi's bestfriend instead. Then the whole things kinda escalated like every hentai which I know it will def happen but wished it wont bc the plot is better to be a romace, Remi became his sex slave (probably the whole school too), her best friend became addicted to dick and he some what became the overlord of the school underground prostitution den. Now he's going to jail then.
